DOC.brief_summary: The study conduct follow purpose 1 . To investigate effect lumbar mobilization muscle activity postpartum mechanical low back pain . 2 . To investigate effect lumbar mobilization pain intensity postpartum mechanical low back pain patient . 3 . To investigate effect lumbar mobilization functional disability postpartum mechanical low back pain patient . 4 . To compare effect lumbar mobilization , tactile stimulation ( placebo treatment ) traditional treatment postpartum mechanical low back pain patient .
DOC.brief_title: Mobilization Post Partum Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: participant divide randomly three group , Group A ( Study group ) receive PA lumbar mobilization plus traditional treatment consist Ultrasonic Infra-red . Group B ( Placebo group ) receive placebo mobilization plus traditional treatment . Group C ( Control group ) receive traditional treatment
DOC.criteria: Females LBP last 3 month since delivery age range 2535 year old body mass index ( BMI ) less 30kg/m2 medical condition n't allow subject lie prone comfortably , cardiovascular disease , uncontrolled hypertension , abdominal hernia , severe respiratory disease , well problem back e.g . previous low back surgery , spinal malignancy . In addition know rheumatic joint disease , upper low motor neuron lesion affect low limb
